app.title: PKU Tools
app.description: Nutritional app for the metabolic disorder PKU.
app.change-info: PWA features (like app installation) are removed here. Please install the new app at

home.title: Home
home.support-me: Support the development of PKU Tools:

phe-search.title: Phe Search
phe-search.source: Source: USDA, FoodData Central, 2019 (fdc.nal.usda.gov). As an example, this is also used for nutritional information in the Google sidebar.

protein-calculator.title: Protein Calculator
protein-calculator.description: Calculate approximate phe values from protein.
protein-calculator.name: Food name

barcode-scanner.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode-scanner.description: Experimental feature: Camera does not yet open reliably on all devices (then please restart the app).
barcode-scanner.note: Notice: On iOS the scanner only works reliably via the browser.
barcode-scanner.info: Phe gets calculated from protein (* 50) | Datasource: openfoodfacts.org

own-food.title: Own Food
own-food.description: Save own food and phe values.
own-food.chart: Not enough entries for the chart.
own-food.limit: Own Food is limited to 500 entries.

phe-log.title: Phe Log
phe-log.description: Log phe values throughout the day.
phe-log.lock-info: Weight and Phe are changed in parallel
phe-log.save-diary: Save in Phe Diary and reset Phe Log

phe-diary.title: Phe Diary
phe-diary.description: Log phe values over several days.
phe-diary.limit: The Phe Diary is limited to 100 entries. Export your data in Excel. Reset via Settings.
phe-diary.log: Log (Editing does not update Total Phe!)
phe-diary.export-confirm: Export Phe Diary in Excel? Note: Avoid duplicate dates in the Phe Diary
phe-diary.note: Limited to 100 entries (~3 months). Export and then Reset via Settings.
phe-diary.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.

amino-counter.title: Amino Counter
amino-counter.description: Count servings of the amino acid mixture.
amino-counter.limit: The Amino Counter is limited to 100 entries. Please reset the history in the Settings.
amino-counter.note: Limited to 100 entries. Reset via Settings.

email-auth.title: Sign in with Email
email-auth.description: Alternative to signing in via Google or Facebook.
email-auth.name: Name
email-auth.reset-note: Receive an email to reset the password.
email-auth.password-sent: Email for password reset has been sent. Please check your emails.

help.title: Help
help.description: Help and FAQ for PKU Tools.
help.install-p1: This is a Progressive Web App and can be installed on any device.
help.install-p3: In Safari, tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen".
help.install-p4: Click the little installation icon in the address bar in Chrome, Brave or Edge.
help.sign-in-p1: You can sign in with Google or Facebook (from the menu in the top right corner).
help.sign-in-p2: Other sign in options are not planned at the moment.
help.support-p1: I provide PKU Tools free of charge. With the link below you can support me :)
help.support-p2: By the way, the app is Open Source. If you want to contribute, contact me.
help.roadmap-p1: The app is constantly being optimized. At the moment only major updates are occasionally communicated in a Facebook group. Contact me for more info.
help.translate-p1: Not at the moment, but you can help with the translation into other languages. Contact me for more info.

other-apps.title: Other Apps
other-apps.phe-rechner: German PKU app that combines calculator, pen, paper and nutrition table (~ 2017).
other-apps.pku-manager: English PKU app for searching, calculating and tracking food (~ 2018).
